languages.text: "Очень важный господин из Адептус Механикус, прибыл на последнем шаттле перед тем, как небо закрыли. Все про какого-то Амаранта или Амарната спрашивал — мол, не прилетал ли такой. Сам на наши вопросы и не отвечал почти, вроде как не обязан он нам ничего рассказывать".

traits.locale_text: "Очень важный господин. Все про какого-то Амаранта или Амарната спрашивал — мол, не прилетал ли такой. Сам на наши вопросы и не отвечал почти, вроде как не обязан он нам ничего рассказывать".

languages.text: "A very important person from the Adeptus Mechanicus arrived on the last shuttle before they locked down the sky. He kept on asking whether anyone by the name of Amarant or Amarnat or something like that had recently arrived. Barely answered any of our questions, though; said he was under no obligation to tell us anything."
languages.original_text: "Очень важный господин из Адептус Механикус, прибыл на последнем шаттле перед тем, как небо закрыли. Все про какого-то Амаранта или Амарната спрашивал — мол, не прилетал ли такой. Сам на наши вопросы и не отвечал почти, вроде как не обязан он нам ничего рассказывать".

traits.locale_text: "A very important character from the Adeptus Mechanicus. He arrived on the last shuttle before they locked down the sky. Kept asking about some Amarant or Amarnat, about whether or not anyone by that name arrived recently. Barely answered any of our questions, though, said he was under no obligation to tell us anything."

"A very important character from the Adeptus Mechanicus. He arrived on the last shuttle before they locked down the sky. Kept asking about some Amarant or Amarnat, about whether or not anyone by that name arrived recently. Barely answered any of our questions, though, said he was under no obligation to tell us anything."

"A very important character from the Adeptus Mechanicus arrived on the last shuttle before they locked down the sky. He kept on asking whether anyone by the name of Amarant or Amarnat or something like that had recently arrived. Barely answered any of our questions, though; said he was under no obligation to tell us anything."

"A very important character from the Adeptus Mechanicus arrived on the last shuttle before they locked down the sky. He kept on asking whether anyone by the name of Amarant or Amarnat or something like that had recently arrived. Barely answered any of our questions, though; said he was under no obligation to tell us anything."

"A very important person from the Adeptus Mechanicus arrived on the last shuttle before they locked down the sky. He kept on asking whether anyone by the name of Amarant or Amarnat or something like that had recently arrived. Barely answered any of our questions, though; said he was under no obligation to tell us anything."

"A very important person from the Adeptus Mechanicus arrived on the last shuttle before they locked down the sky. He kept on asking whether anyone by the name of Amarant or Amarnat or something like that had recently arrived. Barely answered any of our questions, though; said he was under no obligation to tell us anything."

languages.text: "Eine sehr wichtige Person des Adeptus Mechanicus ist auf dem letzten Shuttle eingetroffen, bevor der Himmel abgeriegelt wurde. Er hat immer wieder gefragt, ob vor kurzem jemand namens Amarant oder Amarnat oder so ähnlich eingetroffen ist. Unsere Fragen hat er aber nicht beantwortet. Er hat gesagt, er muss uns nichts sagen."
languages.original_text: "A very important person from the Adeptus Mechanicus arrived on the last shuttle before they locked down the sky. He kept on asking whether anyone by the name of Amarant or Amarnat or something like that had recently arrived. Barely answered any of our questions, though; said he was under no obligation to tell us anything."

traits.locale_text: "Ein sehr wichtiger Mann des Adeptus Mechanicus ist auf dem letzten Shuttle eingetroffen, bevor der Himmel abgeriegelt wurde. Er hat immer weder gefragt, ob vor kurzem jemand namens Amarant oder Amarnat oder so ähnlich eingetroffen ist. Unsere Fragen hat er aber nicht beantwortet. Er hat gesagt, er muss uns nichts sagen."

languages.text: « Un membre très important de l'Adeptus Mechanicus est arrivé à bord de la dernière navette avant qu'ils ne ferment l'espace aérien. Il s'est mis à poser des questions pour savoir si un type du nom d'Amarant ou d'Amarnat, enfin un nom dans ce genre-là, était venu ici récemment. C'est à peine s'il a répondu à nos questions, prétextant qu'il n'avait aucune obligation de le faire. »
languages.original_text: "A very important person from the Adeptus Mechanicus arrived on the last shuttle before they locked down the sky. He kept on asking whether anyone by the name of Amarant or Amarnat or something like that had recently arrived. Barely answered any of our questions, though; said he was under no obligation to tell us anything."

traits.locale_text: « Un membre très important de l'Adeptus Mechanicus est arrivé à bord de la dernière navette avant qu'ils ne ferment l'espace aérien. Il s'est mis à poser des questions pour savoir si un type du nom d'Amarant ou d'Amarnat, enfin un nom dans ce genre-là, était venu ici récemment. C'est à peine s'il a répondu à nos questions, prétextant qu'il n'avait aucune obligation de le faire. »

languages.text: “在叛军封锁天空之前，最后一位乘坐穿梭机来这里的人，是机械修会的某位重要人士。他不停地问我们，说最近有没有一个叫‘阿纳玛特’或‘阿玛纳特’这样的人来过。不过，他几乎没有回答我们任何问题，他说他没有义务告诉我们任何事情。”
languages.original_text: "A very important person from the Adeptus Mechanicus arrived on the last shuttle before they locked down the sky. He kept on asking whether anyone by the name of Amarant or Amarnat or something like that had recently arrived. Barely answered any of our questions, though; said he was under no obligation to tell us anything."

traits.locale_text: “在叛军封锁天空之前，最后一位乘坐穿梭机来这里的人，是机械修会的某位重要人士。他不停地问我们，说最近有没有一个叫“阿玛兰特”或“阿玛纳特”这样的人来过。不过，他几乎没有回答我们任何问题，他说他没有义务告诉我们任何事情。”

languages.text: 「帝国技術局の超重要人物が、空域が封鎖される前に最後のシャトルで到着しました。その方は、アマラントかアマルナトなどという名前の人物が最近ここを訪れたかお尋ねでした。しかし、こちらの質問にはほとんど答えず、私達に何も話す義務はないとのそうです」
languages.original_text: "A very important person from the Adeptus Mechanicus arrived on the last shuttle before they locked down the sky. He kept on asking whether anyone by the name of Amarant or Amarnat or something like that had recently arrived. Barely answered any of our questions, though; said he was under no obligation to tell us anything."

traits.locale_text: 「帝国技術局の超重要人物が、空をロックダウンする前に最後のシャトルで到着しました。その方は、アマラントかアマルナトなどという名前の人物が最近ここを訪れたかお尋ねでした。しかし、こちらの質問にはほとんど答えていません。私達に何か話す義務はないとのそうです」

languages.text: «Alguien muy importante del Adeptus Mechanicus llegó en la última lanzadera antes de que cerraran el cielo. No dejaba de preguntar si había llegado recientemente alguien llamado Armañac o Amarnat o algo así. No respondió a ninguna de nuestras preguntas; dijo que no tenía obligación de decirnos nada».
languages.original_text: "A very important person from the Adeptus Mechanicus arrived on the last shuttle before they locked down the sky. He kept on asking whether anyone by the name of Amarant or Amarnat or something like that had recently arrived. Barely answered any of our questions, though; said he was under no obligation to tell us anything."

traits.locale_text: «Un personaje muy importante del Adeptus Mechanicus llegó en la última lanzadera antes de que cerraran el cielo. No dejaba de preguntar si había llegado recientemente alguien llamado Armañac o Amarnat o algo así. No respondió a ninguna de nuestras preguntas; dijo que no tenía obligación de decirnos nada».

languages.text: "Adeptus Mechanicus'tan çok mühim bir şahıs, hava sahası kapanmadan önceki son mekikle geldi. Yakın zamanda Amarant, Amarnat ya da benzeri bir isme sahip birinin gelip gelmediğini sorup durdu. Sorularımızı da yanıtsız bıraktı, bize laf anlatmak zorunda olmadığını söyledi."
languages.original_text: "A very important person from the Adeptus Mechanicus arrived on the last shuttle before they locked down the sky. He kept on asking whether anyone by the name of Amarant or Amarnat or something like that had recently arrived. Barely answered any of our questions, though; said he was under no obligation to tell us anything."

traits.locale_text: "Adeptus Mechanicus'tan çok mühim bir şahıs, hava sahası kapanmadan önceki son mekikle geldi. Yakın zamanda Amarant, Amarnat ya da benzeri bir isme sahip birinin gelip gelmediğini sorup durdu. Sorularımızı da yanıtsız bıraktı, bize laf anlatmak zorunda olmadığını söyledi."
